text: <speak>You have usage charges of <prosody rate=”slow”>$$session.params.usage_charges.Data.usageSummaryChargeAmt</prosody> for data overedges on your invoice.</speak>

transitionRoutes.condition: ($session.params.usage_charges.Data.usageSummaryChargeAmt = null AND $session.params.usage_charges.Dataservices.usageSummaryChargeAmt = null) OR ($session.params.usage_charges.Data.usageSummaryChargeAmt <= 0 AND $session.params.usage_charges.Dataservices.usageSummaryChargeAmt <= 0) OR ($session.params.usage_charges.Data.usageSummaryChargeAmt = null AND $session.params.usage_charges.Dataservices.usageSummaryChargeAmt <= 0) OR ($session.params.usage_charges.Data.usageSummaryChargeAmt <= 0 AND $session.params.usage_charges.Dataservices.usageSummaryChargeAmt = null)
